Information We Collect We collect several different types of information for various purposes to improve our services to you. **Personal Data** While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to: Email address Name [**Add any other personal data collected by DisplayZone**] **Usage Data** We may also collect information about how you access and use the Service ("Usage Data"). pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Usage Guidelines for DisplayZone Monitors and Accessories DisplayZone HOME ABOUT US Products Contact DisplayZone Terms and Conditions Welcome to DisplayZone! These terms and conditions ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the DisplayZone website (the "Website") and any services offered by DisplayZone (collectively, the "Services"). By accessing or using the Website or Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. 1. Acceptance of Terms These Terms constitute a binding agreement between you and DisplayZone. By accessing or using the Website or Services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these Terms and agree to be bound by them. 2. Use of the Website and Services You may use the Website and Services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to use the Website or Services: In a way that violates any applicable law or regulation. For any purpose that is unauthorized or prohibited by these Terms. To infringe on or violate the rights of any other party. To cause harm to the Website or Services, or to any system or network connected to the Website or Services. To upload or transmit any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, obscene, hateful, or racially or ethnically offensive. To interfere with the use and enjoyment of the Website or Services by any other user. 3. User Content You may submit content (such as text, images, videos, or other materials) to the Website or Services (collectively, "User Content"). You retain all ownership rights in your User Content, but by submitting User Content to the Website or Services, you grant DisplayZone a non-exclusive, irrevocable, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, reproduce, modify, publish, distribute, and translate your User Content in any medium and for any purpose. You are solely responsible for all User Content that you submit to the Website or Services. You represent and warrant that you have all rights necessary to submit your User Content to the Website or Services and to grant the license set forth above. 4. Intellectual Property The Website and Services contain intellectual property owned by DisplayZone, including trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property rights. You agree not to remove, alter, or obscure any copyright notices, trademarks, or other proprietary rights notices contained on the Website or Services. 5. Disclaimer of Warranties THE WEBSITE AND SERVICES ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. DISPLAYZONE DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. DISPLAYZONE DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE WEBSITE OR SERVICES WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE, THAT DEFECTS WILL BE CORRECTED, OR THAT THE WEBSITE OR SERVICES ARE FREE OF VIRUSES OR OTHER HARMFUL COMPONENTS. 6. Limitation of Liability IN NO EVENT SHALL DISPLAYZONE BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH YOUR USE OF THE WEBSITE OR SERVICES, EVEN IF DISPLAYZONE HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.
